attributes.action: Explain why Scottish schools have an average of 20 children per class and English schools have an average of 34.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Would the Prime Minister explain why the Scottish education system (8% of the population) receives 10% of the funding. When will he correct this imbalance and give English schools a FAIR deal?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
